communication_style.sarcasm_rate: Lecture tone; pseudo-scientific framing; frame women as objects with market value.

narratives.c_essay: The dating market is a zero-sum game where men are the true victims. Women are commodities to be won, and their value is determined by their physical appearance and youth.
narratives.p_intro: Welcome to my channel, where I dispense wisdom on how to navigate the treacherous world of dating and become a high-value male.
